name: Invasion (itch) (wanicdigipen)
description:
Description:

After worlds collide, you must run, jump, and shoot your way through swarms of invasive aliens wreaking havoc on Earth. The game is a simple platformer with a unique gravity switching mechanic, and was made by a small student team over the course of two weeks.

To win, you must destroy all the enemies on each level. Move towards the right-most wall to continue to the next level. Try to move as fast as you can.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Spacebar - First Jump
  • Right-Click - Second Jump

Creators:

  • Andrew D.
  • Sim M.
